article: Peter joined the army when he was eighteen, and _ several months he was taught how to be a good soldier. He did quite well in everything except shooting. One day, _ officer _ the young soldiers how to shoot. He asked each soldier to shoot ten times, _ all of them were doing quite well except Peter. After he had shot _ the target nine times and had not _ it once, the officer got angry and said. "You are quite hopeless, Peter! Don't _ your last bullet too! Go behind that _ and shoot yourself with it !" Peter did not say _ and went behind the wall. A few _ later, the officer and the other young soldiers _ the sound of a shot. "Heavens!" the officer said, " _ that foolish man really shot himself ?" He ran behind the wall at once , but Peter was all right . "I'm sorry, sir," he said, "but I _ again."
